Title: Authorizes the town of Pavilion in Genesee county and the town of Covington in Wyoming county to elect a single town justice to preside in the town courts of such towns
Summary: Authorizes the town of Pavilion in Genesee county and the town of Covington in Wyoming county to elect a single town justice to preside in the town courts of such towns.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town of Pavilion in Genesee county and the town of Covington in Wyoming county to elect a single town justice to preside in the town courts of such towns
